title: Dropshipping Email Marketer
job_overview:
We're a fast-scaling eCommerce company operating in multiple markets (primarily EU), looking for an Email Marketing Expert to own our email and SMS campaigns across winning products.

You MUST have experience with:

- Writing & deploying Klaviyo flows and campaigns
- A/B testing subject lines, send times, copy, and CTA formats
- Shopify back-end & Funnelish funnels
- Dropshipping / DTC brands
- Revenue-focused email optimization

? Your Role:

You will:
- Set up email & SMS campaigns for all winning product launches
- Own performance: open rates, click rates, conversion rate, revenue
- Implement & optimize flows: abandoned cart, post-purchase, any other revenue-increasing flow/campaign
- Test new campaign formats weekly to increase revenue per subscriber

???? Your Profile:

- Fluent in English, strong copywriting skills
- 2+ years of Klaviyo experience
- Understands Shopify and Funnelish systems
- Has worked on DTC/dropshipping brands
- Data-driven: knows how to analyze & iterate on performance
- Independent & accountable 

???? To Apply:

Send:
- A short cover letter with results you’ve driven in email/SMS
- Resume
- 2–3 examples of flows/campaigns you've built
